reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 376/07: DELEGATION BY PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION UNDER SUBSECTION 44 (4) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION BY PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION UNDER SUBSECTION 44 (4) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Public Service of Ontario Act, 2006   Loi de 2006 sur la fonction publique de l’Ontario

content.section: Delegation, public servants appointed to work in Commission public body
content.content: 1. For a Commission public body listed in Column 1 of Table 1, the individual who holds the position listed in Column 2 of the Table is prescribed for the purposes of clause 44 (4) (a) of the Act. O. Reg. 376/07, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For a Commission public body listed in Column 1 of Table 1, the individual who holds the position listed in Column 2 of the Table is prescribed for the purposes of clause 44 (4) (a) of the Act. O. Reg. 376/07, s. 1.

content.section: Delegation, public servants appointed to work in Commission public body
content.content:
